name: Army Sniper Surgical Strike
description:
In this Army Sniper Surgical Strike game you can improve your shooting skills by using modern and advance weapons.
If you want to become the best army commando shooter then this game help you
to develop shooting skills which required to become the best fps commando shooter.You are a special sniper of your army and army asign a task for the attack on these gangerous robotic enemies an to clear this area.

Army Sniper Surgical Strike :Features

Best 3D shooter game
Exciting regions
Huge range of weapons
Insane bullet physics
